author: djrtwo
content:
Hi all! 

We are going to experiment with unifying the eth2 and eth1x chats under the same discord. Expect some modified groupings, renamings, and new stuff, along with a bunch of new people hanging out
The research is more and more unifying and ideally the protocols unify sooner rather than later, so this step is a good one to get us better communicating and moving in that direction.
